name: UpdateCampaignAction
description:
Update campaign action details and content.

This tool updates the contents of a specific campaign action, allowing modifications to messages and HTTP requests. Use it to edit existing campaign steps.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the specific campaign to update or retrieve information about.

value_schema.description: The ID of the campaign that you want to trigger or return information about.

parameters.name: action_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the specific action within a campaign to be updated.

value_schema.description: The action you want to lookup or act on.

parameters.name: campaign_action_body_update
parameters.description: A JSON object describing the new content for the campaign action, such as message bodies and HTTP requests.
